name: RollerMonkey2D
description:
A little monkey how likes rollerblade has become the new hero.

She must defeat the Evil Big Banana and restore order in the jungle.

This is a small project made as an exercise at the game programming course, collaborating with 2d artists.

This game has been made as fast as possible and is just a prototype for an eventually ironical 2d platformer.

===============Keys==================

Use arrow keys to skate and spacebar to jump!
